com.artemis

Interface EntityObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentManager, DelayedEntityProcessingSystem, EntityManager, EntityProcessingSystem, EntitySystem, GroupManager, IntervalEntityProcessingSystem, IntervalEntitySystem, Manager, PlayerManager, TagManager, TeamManager, VoidEntitySystem

    public interface EntityObserver
    Used to pass messages to objects that need to be notified about changes to certain entities.
    Author:
    Arni Arent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void added(Entity e)
      Called when an entity the observer is interested in is added.
      void changed(Entity e)
      Called when an entity the observer is interested in has changed.
      void deleted(Entity e)
      Called when an entity the observer is interested in is deleted.
      void disabled(Entity e)
      Called when an entity the observer is interested in has been disabled.
      void enabled(Entity e)
      Called when an entity the observer is interested in has been (re)enabled.
